title: Analyzing MOOC Research Trends Using Text Mining

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of online learning environments and basic text analysis concepts
context.additional_context: Language education course focused on systematically analyzing MOOC research trends for current industry practitioners.

learning_goals: Participants can extract key keywords from MOOC research papers using text-mining tools.
Participants can compare and explain the four major themes of MOOC research (applicability to universities, platforms, learner-content, quality-design).
Participants can visually construct a MOOC research trends map based on text analysis results

resources: Access to MOOC-Related Academic Paper Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
